data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Santiago-Jiménez, Quiyari J. (2016): Macrozoque hoplandrioides (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae), a new genus and species of false Lomechusini from México. Zootaxa 4079 (2), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4079.2.8|2 occurrences
